fullText: Lucas Hedges brings a touching naturalness to his stage debut as the grandson struggling to connect with his beloved grandmother as dementia gradually robs her of her faculties.
dtliExcerpt: Lucas Hedges brings a touching naturalness to his stage debut as the grandson struggling to connect with his beloved grandmother as dementia gradually robs her of her faculties.
